updateInfo.title: The Next Evolution
updateInfo.desc: Canvas. New technologies. Better than ever before. Set sail for new possibilities with Caravel, the next evolution of education software.

updateInfo.title: Clean Sails
updateInfo.desc: A new palette and adjusted app theme sets are available in Caravel improving consistency and legibility. Adjust your app theme in the Account page.

updateInfo.title: New Horizons
updateInfo.desc: The journey doesn't end here. Stay tuned for more.
